original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū piṇḍukkhepakaṁ bhuñjanti …pe…
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū piṇḍukkhepakam bhuñjanti pe
na piṇḍukkhepakam bhuñjissāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca piṇḍukkhepakaṁ bhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca piṇḍukkhepakam bhuñjati āpatti dukkaṭassa
